aboutIndex.paragraph: Hello, my name is Diana Chavez, I am Full-Stack Developer Jr with relevant experience in AGILE and SCRUM methodologies and different programming languages both Front-End and Back-End, I invite you to see some of my projects in this portfolio, thank you for visiting me, I hope you enjoy...

aboutMe.paragraph: Knowledge and experience in Linux, Front-End (HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, ReactJs), Back-End (PHP, Python, Laravel, Django) and Databases (MySQL and MongoDB), I understand how the connection between Front-end works and Back-end and I have the skills to work with these technologies.

resumeContainer.paragraph: Hello, here you can see the preview of my Resume, please download it and contact me, thanks for viewing my portfolio....
resumeContainer.paragraph2: I am Diana Chavez Full-Stack Jr Developer looking for new challenges with all the desire to learn and grow as a Web Developer, do not hesitate to contact me, and thank you for viewing my portfolio, you can also download my Resume with the Download button at the bottom.
